name: Broken System
description:
When a person goes against the system, it is not beneficial to anyone. The people who attacked his health deserve only death. Take revenge on all your enemies using all your skills in battle. Today there will be only one winner.

BrokenSystem - is a 2D shooter where you need to clear all enemies at all levels. Each of them is a potential enemy of all people. Avoid bullets and give a furious rebuff. Your skills will help you with this. Sleight of hand and good strategy are your best friends.

Game Features:
-Pixel Art
- Music
- Lots of Levels
- Difficulty
